alert.note: Alert for Parker Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:14PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central La Paz and San Bernardino Counties through 500 PM MST... At 414 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buckskin Mountain Park, or near Parker Dam, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parker and Buckskin Mountain Park. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 142 and 146, between mile markers 148 and 154, and between mile markers 156 and 161. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
